TopicTitle: Hi to all Kerbalnouts out there

Articles.Content:
KSP is awesome I think it can make it to the game of the year 2012

Short Story:

I reach the ?Mun? or Mum not shure. Land on it when one of my three engine break. Starting immediately over and after some pirouettes at the takeoff bring it back to Kerbol. Land on an small hill, my capsule slide it down and going of into flames.

That was sooo close.

btw. RIP Kerbals

Can\'t whait for Updates.

PS: sorry my english is... you know ^^

have fun

Maik
Hi there, sorry about your kerbalnauts there. Realizing you\'re on a mun mountain ,just as you\'re descending to land, sucks.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Hello!

As far as the game defines it it is called the mun.

Don\'t worry about them kerbals they keep coming back for more!

Welcome to the game and forums. Glad t have you here!

Your friendly neighborhood bag of bones:

Drakomis

Welcome!

Happy launching.

Enjoy your time playing KSP!

-Joey73101

RIP Jeb he died in a little fuel tank explosion...

(Yes I FINALLY hit the mun and the kerbals died..)

Welcome! Happy launchings!

it back to Kerbol. Land on an small hill, my capsule slide it down and going of into flames.

That was sooo close.

It\'s *Kerbin
